articles.title: Bob Marley's grandson found dead at 31 - 1News
articles.description: Jamaican-American rising reggae star Joseph Mersa Marley was found unresponsive in a vehicle in the US.
articles.content:
Joseph Marley. (Source: Bang Showbiz)
Bob Marleys musician grandson has died aged 31.

articles.title: Bob Marley's grandson Joseph Mersa Marley is found dead - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jamaican American reggae artist Joseph Mersa Marley has been found dead at the age of 31. The musician was found unresponsive in a vehicle in the US on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Jamaican-American reggae artist Joseph Mersa Marley is dead at the age of 31. 
The musician was found unresponsive in a vehicle in the United States on Tuesday, according to the streaming service TI… [+3293 chars]

articles.title: Burning sage is more than just a TikTok trend, the practice has sacred Indigenous roots - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Until the 1978 passing of the American Indian Religious Freedom Act, Indigenous people in the US were banned from burning sage.
articles.content: Burning sage, also known as smudging, has become a popular trend in recent years amongst TikTok users, with hundreds of videos ranging from how-tos and casting away bad vibes to prayers and witch rit… [+3284 chars]
